All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ConnectFourGame
ConnectFourGame contains the main logic of the ConnectFour game and all the implementation of functions to play the game.
ConnectFourInitializer
ConnectFourInitializer provides different ways in which the ConnectFour game can be initialized.
GameConstants
GameConstants stores all the static constants used in the ConnectFour library.
GameGrid
GameGrid represents the main grid of the ConnectFour game with slots for a token
GameMode
GameMode enum enumerates the different possible modes in which you can play the ConnectFour game.
GameStatus
GameStatus enum enumerates the different possible status of the ConnectFour game after every move.
IllegalMoveException
This custom exception is thrown when a player makes an illegal move in the ConnectFour grid.
InvalidDimensionException
This custom exception is thrown when invalid dimensions are used to create a the ConnectFour grid.
NoPossibleMovesException
This custom exception is thrown when a player cannot make any legal moves in the ConnectFour grid.
Player
A record to store a player's details
PlayerID
PlayerID enum enumerates the id of the two possible players in the ConnectFour game
TokenColor
TokenColor enum enumerates the color of the two possible tokens in the ConnectFour game
